ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectOrder â€” Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-128 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. for the Albersun Asset Purchase Project
PrecisOrder directing the National Energy Board to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-128 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. (NGTL) for the operation of the ALBERSUN PIPELINE, an existing 179-kilometre natural gas pipeline and associated facilities, in Northeast Alberta.
